EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-03-20-CloudMigrationWebinar-LastChance.Prospect Send
EmailTemplate.subject: [Last Chance to Register] Webinar: How to Accelerate and De-Risk Your Cloud Migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
This is your last chance to register for Thursday's webinar: 3 Ways to Accelerate and De-Risk Your Cloud Migration.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloud_migration_webinar]]>
Turbonomic delivers Workload Automation for Hybrid Cloud environments by simultaneously optimizing performance, cost, and compliance in real-time.
Join our live webinar on Thursday, March 22nd at 1PM ET <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/cloud-migration-webinar/?utm_source=turbonomic&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=cloud_migration_webinar]]> to learn how customers are radically accelerating and de-risking their cloud migrations while driving continuous optimization.
We look forward to seeing you on the webinar!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
